name: Linear Regression Apply Processor
description: Applies a Linear regression model to data.

parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: Name of the model to be applied. If a model with this name cannot be found, the data will go through unchanged.

parameters.name: destroy_on_eof
parameters.description: Will this model be cleaned up once EOF is reached.

parameters.name: data_field
parameters.description: The field the data resides in. Data must be of type Seq[Double].

parameters.name: estimate
parameters.description: If set to true, the coefficients of the regression model are estimated before applying the model. If set to false, it is assumed that the model is deserialized from pre-stored coefficients.
